item.title: Interactive Timelines of Nutrition, Food and Health
item.description: Next, we decided to establish a basic timeline of major events in the nutrition sciences over time. We decided to break this down into three distinct timelines based on science, politics and the social. Here is the science timelineâ€¦ + - {"x":{"items":[{"id":"10","content":"Framingham Heart Study","start":"1948","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science","source":"Wikipedia"},{"id":"11","content":"Household Food Consumption Survey","start":"1965","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science"},{"id":"12","content":"Ten State Nutrition Survey","start":"1968","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science"},{"id":"13","content":"National Health and Nutrition Examiniation Survey","start":"1971","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science","source":"Wikipedia"},{"id":"14","content":"Nutrition research shifts to \"omics\" research","start":"1990","end":"2019","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science"},{"id":"15","content":"Scientific replication crisis"
